SELECT MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_CODE , CASE WHEN IS_ADMIN = 'USER' THEN '회원' WHEN IS_ADMIN = 'ARBEIT' THEN '알바생' WHEN IS_ADMIN = 'ADMIN' THEN '관리자' END IS_ADMIN FROM studyroom_member
WHERE ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
WHERE (CASE WHEN IS_ADMIN = 'USER' THEN '회원' WHEN IS_ADMIN = 'ARBEIT' THEN '알바생' WHEN IS_ADMIN = 'ADMIN' THEN '관리자' END) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY MEMBER_CODE DESC

SELECT MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ID , CASE WHEN MEMBER_GENDER = 'M' THEN '남성' WHEN MEMBER_GENDER = 'W' THEN '여성' END AS MEMBER_GENDER , MEMBER_TEL , POST_CODE , MEMBER_ADDR , ADDR_DETAIL , CASE WHEN IS_ADMIN = 'USER' THEN '회원' WHEN IS_ADMIN = 'ARBEIT' THEN '알바생' WHEN IS_ADMIN = 'ADMIN' THEN '관리자' END AS IS_ADMIN , DATE_FORMAT(MEMBER_BIRTH, '%Y-%m-%d') MEMBER_BIRTH FROM STUDYROOM_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode}

SELECT SEAT_NUM , CASE WHEN SEAT_POWER = 'ON' THEN '켜짐' WHEN SEAT_POWER = 'OFF' THEN '꺼짐' END SEAT_POWER , SEAT_FLOOR , SEAT.STATUS_NUM , AGE_CODE , SEAT.MEMBER_CODE FROM STUDYROOM_SEAT SEAT INNER JOIN STUDYROOM_MEMBER MEMBER ON SEAT.MEMBER_CODE = MEMBER.MEMBER_CODE INNER JOIN seat_status STATUS ON SEAT.STATUS_NUM = STATUS.STATUS_NUM WHERE SEAT.MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode}
SELECT CHARGE_DATE FROM APPROVAL AP INNER JOIN STUDYROOM_CHARGE CH ON AP.CHARGE_CODE = CH.CHARGE_CODE WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode}
